meanings.sent1: The yolkiest part of the egg is the yellow center.
meanings.sent2: Her omelette was the yolkiest I had ever tasted.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that the yolkiest eggs make the best custard.
meanings.sent4: The yolkiest sunset painted the sky in shades of orange and yellow.
meanings.sent5: The yolkiest yolks come from free-range chickens.

meanings.sent1: The yolkiest watermelon in the patch was the largest.
meanings.sent2: She proudly displayed the yolkiest pumpkin at the fair.
meanings.sent3: The farmer boasted about his yolkiest harvest of the season.
meanings.sent4: The yolkiest basket of eggs was carefully carried to the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The yolkiest tree in the orchard bore the most fruit.

meanings.sent1: The yolkiest flower in the garden had a bright yellow center.
meanings.sent2: The yolkiest balloon at the party was shaped like an egg.
meanings.sent3: The artist painted a yolkiest sun in the corner of the canvas.
meanings.sent4: The yolkiest costume at the parade was a giant egg.
meanings.sent5: The yolkiest circle on the page was colored in yellow crayon.
